name: Polter(g)Heist
description: Polter(g)Heist is a hack of Honey Heist by Grant Howitt (@gshowitt) where your team of 2-5 ghosts attempts to commit the crime of their (after)lives. Using a simple d6 system with the two stats of Spook and Heist, your goal is to bypass all complications and obtain your target by any means necessary. But little do the ghosts know...
